sen.j: 洛西口駅（らくさいぐちえき）は、京都府京都市西京区と向日市の境にある、阪急電鉄阪急京都本線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located on the boundary between Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Muko City, Rakusaiguchi Station is a stop on the Hankyu Kyoto Line, which is operated by the Hankyu Railway.
Rakusaiguchi Station, located on the boundary between Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture and Muko City, is a stop on the Hankyu Kyoto Line, which is operated by the Hankyu Railway.

Rakusaiguchi Station, located on the boundary between Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City and Muko City, both located in Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Hankyu Kyoto Line, which is operated by the Hankyu Railway.
sen.cmt: 西京区と向日市が両方とも京都府にある、という表現に変更しました。

sen.j: 開業の経緯
sen.e: Circumstances of the opening of the station
Circumstances of the station's opening
Circumstances of the station's opening

sen.j: かつて、この付近には戦後まもない1946年（昭和21年）2月1日に「物集女駅（もずめえき）」が設けられていたが、1948年（昭和23年）の3月1日に廃止されていた。
sen.e: On February 1, 1946, just after the war, 'Mozume Station' was built around this area, which was abandoned on March 1, 1948.
On February 1, 1946, just after the war, 'Mozume Station' was built in this area, but on March 1, 1948 it was abandoned.
On February 1, 1946, just after the war, 'Mozume Station' was built in this area, but on March 1, 1948 it was abandoned.

sen.j: しかし、近辺の麒麟麦酒京都工場の閉鎖など周辺の再開発の気運が盛り上がり、また洛西ニュータウンへのアクセス駅である桂駅の周辺道路事情が悪い事などから、新駅設置の運びとなった。
sen.e: However, a new station was built when the momentum of redeveloping the area around the station was increased after the closure of the Kirin Brewery Company, Limited near the station, as well as because of the poor transportation around Katsura Station that leads to Rakusai Newtown.

However, a new station was built when the momentum of redeveloping the area around the station increased, following the closure of the Kirin Brewery Company, Ltd., near the station, and due to the poor transportation around Katsura Station, which leads to Rakusai Newtown.

However, a new station was built when the momentum of redeveloping the area around the station increased, following the closure of the Kirin Brewery Company, Ltd., near the station, and due to the poor transportation around Katsura Station, which leads to Rakusai Newtown.

sen.j: 阪急電鉄では、山田駅 (大阪府)（1973年）以来30年ぶりの新駅開業、また物集女駅廃止から55年ぶりの駅復活とあって、京都線の一部車両には開業記念装飾が施され、また自動券売機限定も含めて9種もの開業記念ラガールカードが発行された。
sen.e: For the Hankyu Railway, the new station was built for the first time in three decades after Yamada Station (Osaka Prefecture) (1973) and the station was restored for the first time in 55 years after the abandonment of Mozume Station; some trains running on the Kyoto Line were decorated as a memorial to the opening, while as many as nine types of Lagare Cards were issued as a memorial to the opening, including the limited type of cards available only from the automatic ticket machine.

For the Hankyu Railway, the new station was the first built in three decades since Yamada Station (Osaka Prefecture) (1973) and the station was restored for the first time in 55 years after the abandonment of Mozume Station; some trains running on the Kyoto Line were decorated as a memorial to the opening, while as many as nine types of Lagare cards were issued to commemorate the event, including limited types of cards available only from the automatic ticket machine.

For the Hankyu Railway, the new station was the first built in three decades since Yamada Station (Osaka Prefecture) (1973) and the station was restored for the first time in fifty-five years after the abandonment of Mozume Station; some trains running on the Kyoto Line were decorated as a memorial to the opening, while as many as nine types of Lagare cards were issued to commemorate the event, including limited types of cards available only from the automatic ticket machine.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 駅構造
sen.e: Station layout
The station's structure
Station layout

sen.j: 相対式2面2線のホームを持つ地上駅。
sen.e: Rakusaiguchi Station is an aboveground station with two separate platforms serving two tracks.
Rakusaiguchi Station is an aboveground station with two separate platforms serving two tracks.
Rakusaiguchi Station is an aboveground station with two separate platforms serving two tracks.

sen.j: 将来、当駅およびその前後で行われるで高架駅化が予定されており、現在の駅舎とホームは簡素な造りとなっている。
sen.e: In the feature, Rakusaiguchi Station and adjacent stations will be elevated; therefore, the current station building and platforms are made in a simple structure.
In the future, Rakusaiguchi Station and adjacent stations will be elevated; therefore, the current station building and platforms comprise a simple structure.
In the future, Rakusaiguchi Station and adjacent stations will be elevated; therefore, the current station building and platforms comprise a simple structure.

sen.j: 上下線で改札が分離されており、改札内で互いのホームを行き来する事はできない。
sen.e: Each inbound platform and outbound platform has a ticket gate, and the platforms are separate; it is impossible to move from one platform to another within the ticket gate.
Each inbound platform and outbound platform has a ticket gate, and the platforms are separate; consequently, it's impossible to move from one platform to another within the ticket gate.
Each inbound platform and outbound platform has a ticket gate, and the platforms are separate; consequently, it's impossible to move from one platform to another within the ticket gate.

sen.j: 上下線共改札はホームの河原町寄りにある。
sen.e: Both ticket gates (on the inbound and outbound platforms) are located on the Kawaramachi side of the platforms.
Both ticket gates (on the inbound and outbound platforms) are located on the Kawaramachi side of the platforms.
Both ticket gates (on the inbound and outbound platforms) are located on the Kawaramachi side of the platforms.

sen.j: また、駅舎入口の駅名板やホームでは竹をイメージした装飾がなされている。
sen.e: The board of the station name at the entrance of the station building and platforms have decorations adopted from bamboo.
The board bearing the station name at the entrance to the station building and platforms has decorations adapted from bamboo.
The board bearing the station name at the entrance to the station building and platforms has decorations adapted from bamboo.

sen.j: ※のりば番号は設定されていない。
sen.e: ※Track numbers are not assigned.
※Track numbers aren't assigned.
Platform numbers aren't assigned.

sen.j: 特徴
sen.e: Feature
Features
Features

sen.j: 隣の桂駅の配線の関係上、ごく僅かであるが、桂車庫からの送り出しを兼ねた当駅始発の梅田方面行列車が設定されている。
sen.e: Due to the line of the next Katsura Station, there is a few first trains departing from this station for Umeda Station, which was sent out from Katsura depot.
Due to the line of the next station, Katsura, the first few trains depart from this station for Umeda Station, being sent out from the Katsura depot.
Due to the line of the next station, Katsuragawa, the first few trains depart from this station for Umeda Station, being sent out from the Katsura train depot.

(JR) Katsuragawa Station, which opened in the fall of 2008, is about 600 meters away from the station.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1946年（昭和21年）2月1日 物集女駅開業。
sen.e: On February 1, 1946 Mozume Station was opened.
February 1, 1946: Mozume Station was opened.
February 1, 1946: Mozume Station was opened.

sen.j: 1948年（昭和23年）3月1日 物集女駅廃止。
sen.e: On March 1, 1948 Mozume Station was abandoned.
March 1, 1948: Mozume Station was abandoned.
March 1, 1948: Mozume Station was abandoned.

sen.j: 2003年（平成15年）3月16日 洛西口駅開業。
sen.e: On March 16, 2003 Rakusaiguchi Station was opened.
March 16, 2003: Rakusaiguchi Station was opened.
March 16, 2003: Rakusaiguchi Station was opened.

sen.j: 2008年（平成20年）3月 高架化工事を着工予定。
sen.e: March, 2008: the elevation construction will begin.

March, 2008: the elevation construction will begin.
